entry.title: Thursday night: Snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind northeast 20 km/h. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 30 March 2023
